text: Shraddha Kapoor is an Indian actress and singer who appears in Hindi movies of Bollywood. Shraddha made her career in 2010 alongside Amitabh Bachchan in Teen Patti. She gained wide recognition for playing a singer in the commercially successful romantic drama film Aashiqui 2 (2013), which was starred by Aditya Roy Kapur. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Punjabi people Category:Indian movie actors Category:Singers from Mumbai Category:Actors from Mumbai Category:Marathi people Category:Models from Mumbai Category:Indian Hindus
title: Shraddha Kapoor
